properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains "time" and (FolderPath endswith "\\net.exe" or FolderPath endswith "\\net1.exe")) or (ProcessCommandLine contains "tz" and FolderPath endswith "\\w32tm.exe")
